q1: Do you think this team will qualify for the next World Cup?
q2: Do you think they need a new style of play?
a2: I think Spain's way of playing has been found out, and a lot of smaller teams know how to combat it, so yes.
q3: Does Spain need to become a bit more aggresive?
a3: Spain has a great team and they don't need be more aggresive.
q4: Don't you think they need to be more direct in attack to get more goals?
a4: Possibly, but if they become too aggressive they'll lose a lot of their strong defense.
